ygData.subject: RE: exploit....dont make me laugh
ygData.msgSnippet: ahem...verant HAS said they could make that much....hence trade skills also....you forget that some are creative in their endeavours and you can sell
ygData.messageBody:
ahem...verant HAS said they could make that much....hence trade skills
also....you forget that some are creative in their endeavours and you can
sell armor/weapons for a nice amount if you can make/get ahold of them :)

-----Original Message-----
From: Curtis Bennett [mailto:die_kluge@...]
Sent: Wednesday, October 20, 1999 11:48 AM
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] exploit....dont make me laugh


From: "Curtis Bennett" <die_kluge@...>

Look, all I'm saying is that there are thousands of people, myself
included, that scrimp and save and sell every rusty mace, bat wing
and spider leg we have just to get by. I have just about crawled out
of places like Befallen to sell every piece of junk I looted. Even
asking my team-members, "if you don't want that trash, give it to me".
If you are 15th level, and are making 250 plat an hour, then Verant
is obviously not aware of it, because that goes against the whole
philosophy of the game. It simply was not designed so that 15th level
characters have that much money. So you're not cheating, fine.
Could you at least share with us the means by which you are getting
this money? Is it a quest, or specific mob, are you auctioning stuff
off, what?
Of course we're all accusatory, because we're all skeptical!

>From: Ralph Carothers <CarothersR@...>
>
>its lovely to see faith in mankind....i swear.....if someone learns how to
>do something that another doesnt know...and IS NOT exploting crap....its
>cheating right off the bat. How about you try hunting things that drop
>items that if your quick enough...or bind at the right spot you can make
>some nice cash....and notice...i didnt say I was alone did I?

>hey look...i finished this quest....or I did this and got an item NO ONE
>has seen. (aka- i've just gotten a fiery avenger or something) I'd love to

>have people telling me i'm exploiting something because I just got an item
>no one has....and I'm sure you'd be right there to line up with them.

>i DO NOT cheat at online games...or any type of roleplay....thanks for
>thinking that though.
>
>Bann
